articles.title: Hinduja in talks with private debt funds for about $800 million - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Over the last five years, the country notched up the highest investment volume in Asia, according to research from the Global Private Capital Association, a body representing investors.
articles.content: Hinduja Group is in talks with private credit funds to raise about $800 million to back the acquisition of Reliance Capital, according to people familiar with the matter, who asked not to be identifi… [+1029 chars]

articles.author: Naman Ramachandran
articles.title: Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival Returns With South Asian Focus - Variety
articles.description: After a three-year hiatus, the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival is returning with an expanded focus on South Asian cinema.
articles.content:
After a three-year hiatus, the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival is returning with a larger lineup and an expanded focus on South Asian cinema.
